actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Joint resolution to suspend temporarily the authority of the Interstate Commerce Commission to permit the abandonment of a line of railroad or the operation thereof.

summary.text: Suspends the authority of the Interstate Commerce Commission to issue a certificate permitting the abandonment of a line of railroad or the operation thereof, until January 1, 1974. Prohibits such abandonment by a carrier by rail upon the authority of a certificate issued after April 1, 1972, and prior to January 1, 1974.

titles.title: Joint resolution to suspend temporarily the authority of the Interstate Commerce Commission to permit the abandonment of a line of railroad or the operation thereof.
